text: Mario Daniel Pinedo Chore (born April 9, 1964 in La Paz) is a retired Bolivian footballer who played as a midfielder for the Bolivia national football team in the 1994 FIFA World Cup. ==Club career== He has played for Oriente Petrolero, The Strongest, Blooming and Real Santa Cruz. ==International career== Pinedo earned 22 caps between 1985 and 1994Appearances for Bolivia National Team - RSSSF and was a squad member at the 1994 FIFA World Cup for the Bolivia national team. ==References== ==External links== * *playerhistory * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from La Paz Category:Association football midfielders Category:Bolivian footballers Category:Club Destroyers players Category:Oriente Petrolero players Category:Club Blooming players Category:Bolivia international footballers Category:1994 FIFA World Cup players
title: Mario Pinedo
